fastformat::sinks::WindowsConsole_sink

WindowsConsole_sink Class Reference
[Sinks]

#include <fastformat/sinks/WindowsConsole.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Sink for coloured output via Windows' console.

Public Member Functions

 Constructs an instance of the sink.

Parameters:
hConsole Handle of the console, or NULL to use the standard output handle.
